titles.title: Recognizing the 150th anniversary of the Rock Island Arsenal and the men and women who currently and have previously worked on Arsenal Island.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 6/29/2012--Introduced. Recognizes: (1) the 150th anniversary of the Rock Island Arsenal, Illinois, and (2) the importance of maintaining the government owned and operated manufacturing capabilities provided by the Arsenal to the U.S. Army and our national defense.
